desc: A woman owned small business specialized in soy candles and home decorations. All of our candles are vegan-friendly, cruelty free, and made just outside the Montreal region using all natural/organic soy wax, cotton wicks, and vegan fragrance oils.

layout.text: All natural soy wax candles hand poured in Montreal, Quebec. Woman owned and operated. Vegan friendly and cruelty-free home products carefully made with love.
